original_text: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
korean_text: 이 천국 복음이 모든 민족에게 증언되기 위하여 온 세상에 전파되리니 그제야 끝이 오리라

sentences.original_text: And this gospel of the kingdom
will be preached in the whole world
as a testimony to all nations
and then the end will come
